decisions.description: Distributes off of the "HS Intake Vendor" field. This is auto assigned in HubSpot workflows when a form is filled.
decisions.name: CPL_Intake_Vendor_Distro
decisions.label: CPL - Intake Vendor Distro

decisions.description: Distributes off of the "HS Intake Vendor" field. This is auto assigned in HubSpot workflows when a form is filled.
decisions.name: No_CPL_Intake_Vendor_Distro
decisions.label: No CPL - Intake Vendor Distro

Flow.description: When a form is submitted in HubSpot, HubSpot will create/update the party in Salesforce. When "Create Intake Trigger" is TRUE, this flow will create the intake and associate it to the party that triggered it. Finalized by unchecking the "Create Intake Trigger" field (if a new intake is triggered in the future)

formulas.description: Finds if the most recent intake associated with a Party and if it is within 30 days or not.
formulas.name: Most_Recent_Intake_30_Days

Flow.interviewLabel: HubSpot Form | PFAS | Create Intake Updated {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: HubSpot Form | PFAS | Create Intake with CPL

recordUpdates.description: Unchecks the field "Create Intake Trigger" on the triggering party to reset the intake creation process if a new intake needs to be created in the future for the same party.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Party_Triggers_to_False
recordUpdates.label: Update Party Triggers to False
